item.description:
Cassidy's Grille is the host of this year's Acoustic Cafe Halloween Party. Last year's party was a huge success. We invite everyone to come in full costume to play music, fill yourselves with food and spirits (punny, I know) and have a great time. We will be raffling off gift cards and discounts to Cassidy's, and we will be finishing the event with a costume contest with prizes. This event will run from 7:30 -9:30 with music sign ups at 7:15.

We look forward to seeing you all in your best attire!

Thanks much,
The AC Team
item.name: Cassidy's Open Mic Halloween Party!
